notes: Small benign-appearing nodule with smooth margins and no suspicious features
report:
FINDINGS: An 8.5mm well-circumscribed solid nodule is identified in the right upper lobe. The nodule demonstrates smooth margins without spiculation. No calcification is present. The lesion appears stable compared to prior imaging.

IMPRESSION: Benign-appearing pulmonary nodule in the right upper lobe. Findings are consistent with a granuloma or benign lesion. Routine follow-up recommended.
